Package com.spid.android.sdk.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SPiDAccessTokenException
    Signals that there was a problem generating a SPiDAccessToken
    SPiDApiException
    Signals that a API exception has occurred in SPiD
    SPiDAuthenticationAlreadyRunningException
    Signals that a authentication request is already running
    SPiDDeviceFingerprintException
    Signals that there was a error trying to generate a device fingerprint
    SPiDException
    Base class for all exceptions in SPiD.
    SPiDInvalidAccessTokenException
    Signals that the access token is invalid or expired
    SPiDInvalidRequestException
    Signals that there was a problem with the request to SPiD
    SPiDInvalidResponseException
    Signals that there was a problem with the response received from SPiD
    SPiDKeychainException
    Signals that there was a problem encrypting/decrypting the access token from SharedPreferences
    SPiDOAuthException
    Signals that there was a problem with OAuth 2.0, see http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-oauth-v2
    SPiDUnknownUserException
    Signals that the access token is invalid
    SPiDUserAbortedLoginException
    Signals that the user aborted login
